data.text: Digi duai, tuai hagabuulinga dangada dogologo gu dagabuli mai gi di gowaa e dahi, guu odi nadau meegai, gei Jesus ga gahi mai ana dama agoago gi dono baahi, ga helekai,
“Au gu aloho i tagabuulinga dangada dogologo deenei, guu dolu nadau laangi i dogu baahi, gu nadau mee e gai dolomeenei ai.
Maa Au ga hagau digaula hiigai, gei digaula ga hagalibelibeina i di nadau hula, idimaa, hunu ginaadou ne loomoi haga mogowaa.”
Ana dama agoago ga heeu, “Di anggowaa beenei le e mee di gida nia meegai e dohu di haangai nia daangada huogodoo aanei?”
Jesus ga heeu, “Nia palaawaa e hia i godou baahi?”

Mee ga helekai gi tagabuulinga daangada gii noho gi lala. Gei Mee ga dahi aga nia palaawaa e hidu, ga danggee gi God, ga ginigini, gaa wanga gi ana dama agoago gi duwwaa gi digaula, gei ana dama agoago gaa duwwe nia maa.
Digaula nadau dama iga labelaa i golo, gei Jesus ga danggee i nia maa, ga helekai gi ana dama agoago gi duwwaa ina labelaa gi digaula.
Digaula ga miami, gu maaluu. Holongo digaula huogodoo le e haa mana (4,000). Nia dama agoago gaa haa nia gada e hidu gi nia mee ala ne dubu. Gei Jesus ga haga maaheu digaula.
Di madagoaa hua deelaa, gei Jesus mo ana dama agoago gaa kaga gi hongo di boodi, gaa hula gi nia henua o Dalmanutha.
Hunu Pharisee ne lloomoi, gaa hai nadau donu gi Jesus, e hiihai e haga hala a Mee, ga helekai gi Mee, “Heia dau mogobuna gi modongoohia bolo God la i do baahi.”8.11 Matthew 12.38; Luke 11.16

Jesus gaa dogi aga loo i ono lodo ga helekai, “Nia daangada dolomeenei, le e aha ala e hiihai gi di mogobuna? Goodou gi iloo bolo di mogobuna e wanga gi di adu dangada dolomeenei ai.”8.12 Matthew 12.39; Luke 11.29
Mee ga hagatanga, gaa hana i di boodi gi di baahi i golo o tai.
Nia dama agoago a maa gu de haawa di gaamai nadau palaawaa gii dohu, di palaawaa hua e dahi dela i baahi digaula i hongo di boodi.
Jesus ga helekai, “Goodou haga ligaliga i nia ‘yeast’ o nia Pharisee mo nia ‘yeast’ o Herod.”8.15 Luke 12.1
Digaula ga leelee i nadau mehanga, “Mee e helekai beelaa, idimaa, gidaadou tadau palaawaa ai.”
Jesus ga iloo nadau helekai, ga heeu, “Ma e aha goodou e helekai bolo godou palaawaa ai? Goodou digi donu, gei digi iloo nia mee aanei? Goodou e noho boo godou lodo?
Godou golomada i golo gei e dee gida? Godou dalinga i golo, gei e dee longono? Goodou gu de langahia8.18 Jeremiah 5.21; Ezekiel 12.2; Mark 4.12
di madagoaa ne ginigini agu palaawaa e lima, gaa duwwe gi digau e lima mana (5,000)? Nia gada e hia ala ne haa go goodou gii honu i nia mee ala ne dubu?”
Gei Jesus ga heeu, “Di madagoaa ne ginigini agu palaawaa e hidu ang gi digau e haa mana (4,000), nia gada e hia ala ne haa go goodou gii honu i nia mee ala ne dubu?”
Jesus ga heeu, “Malaa goodou digi donu beleiaha?”
Di nadau dau i Bethsaida, gei nia daangada ga laha mai di nadau dangada deegida gi Jesus, gaa dangi gi Mee gii bili gi di nadau dangada.
Jesus gaa kumi di lima o maa, gaa dagi gi daha mo di waahale. I muli di bui ana haawale gi nia golomada o maa, ga daahi ono lima gi hongo o mee, ga heeu, “Goe gu gidee?”
Gei mee ga ala aga ga helekai, “Uaa, au gu gidee nia daangada, e hai be nia laagau e heehee.”
Jesus gaa dugu labelaa ono lima gi hongo nia golomada o maa. Gei mee gaa mmada laa haga madammaa gi nia mee huogodoo.
Jesus ga hagau a mee gi dono hale ga helekai gi mee, “Goe hudee hana labelaa laa lodo di waahale deelaa.”
Gei Jesus mo ana dama agoago gaa hula gi nia waahale e hoohoo gi Caesarea Philippi. I di nadau hula, gei Jesus ga heeu, “Hagia mai malaa, nia daangada le e helekai bolo Au koai?”
Gei digaula ga helekai, “Hunu gau e helekai bolo Goe go John Babdais, gei hunu gau e helekai bolo Goe go Elijah, hunu gau e helekai bolo Goe tangada i nia soukohp.”8.28 Mark 6.14-15; Luke 9.7-8
Gei Jesus ga heeu, “Gei goodou bolo Au koai?”8.29 John 6.68-69
Gei Jesus ga helekai bule gi digaula, “Goodou hudee hagi anga ina Au gi nia daangada.”

Jesus ga daamada ga agoago gi ana dama agoago, “Tama Tangada le e hai loo gi hagaduadua, ge e haga balumee go nia dagi mmaadua, mo nia dagi aamua hai mee dabu, mo digau haga donudonu haganoho. Gei Au ga daaligi gii made, gei i muli nia laangi e dolu, ga mouli aga.”
Mee gu helekai haga mmaa gi modongoohia digaula. Malaa, Peter gaa lahi a Mee gi mada ginaua, gaa hai ono ngudu gi Mee.
Gei Jesus gaa huli gi daha mo Peter, gaa mmada gi ana dama agoago, ga haga donu adu Peter, “Tuu i daha mo Au, Setan. Au maanadu la hagalee mai baahi o God, nia hagamaanadu hua dangada dangada.”

Gei Jesus ga haga dagabuli mai digau dogologo, mo ana dama agoago, ga helekai, “Maa tangada e hiihai e daudali Au, gi haga balumee ina ia, aamoo dono loobuu, daudali mai Au.8.34 Matthew 10.38; Luke 14.27
Maa goe e hiihai e bida benebene do mouli, gei goe ga de gidee do mouli. Maa goe ga diiagi do mouli i di Au mo di Longo Humalia, goe ga gidee do mouli.8.35 Matthew 10.39; Luke 17.33; John 12.25
Di humalia aha e gila adu gi di goe maa goe ga hai mee gi henuailala hagatau, gei e deemee di hai mee gi do mouli donu? Hagalee!
Di mee i golo ai bolo e wanga gei goe ga hai mee labelaa gi do mouli!

Tangada dela e langaadia i di au, mo agu agoago i lodo nia laangi mouli huaidu dolomeenei, gei Tama Tangada le e langaadia labelaa i mee, i dono hanimoi i nia madamada o dono Damana, mo digau di langi haga madagu.”
